string.name: hiUser
string.comment: %s is the title+username e.g. 'GM ABC' or simply ABC if there is no title

string.name: awaitQuestion
string.comment: Displayed while waiting for results

resources.string: What have you been up to this year?
What a chess year you've had!
You did not play any games this year.

string.name: gamesYouWon
string.comment: %s is the number of games won

resources.string: What did it take to get there?

string.name: timeSpentPlayingExclam
string.comment: %s is the time spent playing animated from 0 e.g. '1 day, 17 hours'. The time is also translated

resources.string: That is way too much chess.
That is a lot of chess.
That seems like a reasonable amount of chess.
How many moves did you play in all that time?

string.name: movesOfWoodPushed
string.comment: %s is a weight in grams or kilograms

string.name: firstMoveStats
string.comment: Subtitle to your most played move e.g. '1. e4'. %s is the number of games played and its percentage in parentheses. e.g. '50 (67%)'

resources.string: is how you started %s of your games as white

plurals.name: openingsMostPlayedAsWhite
plurals.item: Your most played opening as white with %s game
Your most played opening as white with %s games

plurals.name: openingsMostPlayedAsBlack
plurals.item: Your most played opening as black with %s game
Your most played opening as black with %s games

plurals.name: puzzlesThanksVoting
plurals.comment: %s is the number of puzzles. It is also translated.
plurals.item: Thank you for voting on %s puzzle.
Thank you for voting on %s puzzles.

string.name: puzzlesHelpedTagging
string.comment: %s is a number e.g. 5

resources.string: You also helped tag %s of them.
You did not solve any puzzles this year.
You won %s of them on the first try!
What time controls and variants did you play?

string.name: malwareNoneLoaded
string.comment: %s is 0

resources.string: We didn't sell your personal data
We didn't use your device against you

string.name: malwareWarningPrefix
string.comment: %s is 'be careful'

resources.string: But other websites do, so please %s.

string.name: malwareWarningCta
string.comment: It is a link to https://lichess.org/ads

string.name: lichessGamesPlayedIn
string.comment: %1$s is the number of games, %2$s is the year

string.name: lichessGamesOfThemYours
string.comment: %s is the percentage of games that are yours

resources.string: Thank you for playing on Lichess!

string.name: thanksHaveAGreat
string.comment: %s is the next year

resources.string: We're glad you're here. Have a great %s!

string.name: patronCostsThisYear
string.comment: %1$s is 'costs'. %2$s is the cost with currency symbol e.g. '$750,000'

string.name: patronCosts
string.comment: It is a link to lichess.org/costs

resources.string: We're a charity, running purely on donations.

string.name: patronConsiderDonating
string.comment: %s is 'supporting us with a donation'

resources.string: If we helped entertain you this year, or you believe in our work, please consider %s!

string.name: patronMakeDonation
string.comment: It is a link to https://lichess.org/patron

string.name: shareableTitle
string.comment: %s is the current year

string.name: shareableSpentPlaying
string.comment: subtitle to the translated time they have spent playing

string.name: recapReady
string.comment: %s is the year of the recap
